title: HBCU Football Teams Getting Big Matchups
itunes:title: HBCU Football Teams Getting Big Matchups
description:
HBCU football teams are getting a rare opportunity to play in games against major NCAA football powerhouses in two early season matchups. Hosts Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu welcome Bloomberg's Janet Lorin to discuss the pros and cons these games have for HBCUs. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
